response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us and has been meticulously crafted to meet your highest expectations. Given its unique nature and the quality it embodies, we believe it is worth every penny of $1,200,000 to you. We understand the importance of making such a significant investment, and we are confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations.

To secure this remarkable piece, we are offering you the chance to purchase it at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This offer is valid for a limited time and is exclusive to you, Bob. We trust that you will appreciate the exceptional value and the opportunity this presents.

Should you choose to proceed, please let us know, and we will arrange for a seamless transaction. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
